name: Suggestion Box
description:
After a less than stellar quarterly report, the heads of Oberon Corp. decide to implement a bold PR stunt: a suggestion box that customers nationwide can submit their ideas for the newest Oberon products from. 

The only issue is that almost all of the suggestions are a combination of illegal, immoral, and just plain stupid.

But Oberon strives to keep its promises to its loyal customers, so it is your duty as the company’s newly elected “Head of Suggestion Quality Control” to find the best of the worst, and help keep the company afloat for just an hour or two more.

Game By: Colin Walsh (@ColinWalshVEVO)
